actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, June 8, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, June 8, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN83:
        Nusrat Jahan Choudhury, of New York, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern District of New York

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.


 PN86:
        Dale E. Ho, of New York, to be United States District Judge for the Southern District of New York

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.


 PN90:
        Julie Rikelman, of Massachusetts, to be United States Circuit Judge for the First Circuit

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.


 PN138:
        Elizabeth Allen, of New York, to be Under Secretary of State for Public Diplomacy

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 29. Record Vote Number: 153 


        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate 6/13/2023.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Ms. Smith, at  6:32 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
